entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -22.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 1:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -22.4°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
